name: Balrog The Frog: Arcade DXi (2009)
description:
Balrog The Frog: Arcade DXi brings back the beloved fly fishing minigame from the original Froghouse (1995) straight to your favorite handheld.

Catch the flies and use the infamous flash sign freeze technique to increase your score.

Controls:

WASD -> d-pad
Space -> L

Mouse -> stylus
